description:
Onda Aka is a twenty-year-old aspiring seiyuu. After her apartment burns down, she moves in with http://anidb.net/ch12306 [Matsumaru]. The beginning of their relationship is a strained one, as Aka has sex with Matsumaru on their first night together and tries to maintain a just friends relationship. Eventually however, the two of them begin to date for real.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Onda Aka
